scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist && shx rm -rf node_modules
scripts.static: shx cp views/index.ejs dist/home.ejs && shx cp views/error.ejs dist/error.ejs
scripts.js:min: browserify public/javascripts/ > dist/tmp.js && babili dist/tmp.js > dist/main.js
scripts.debug: npm run setup && shx mkdir dist && npm run css && npm run js && npm run static
scripts.build: npm run setup && shx mkdir dist &&  npm run css:min && npm run js:min && npm run static
scripts.test: shx mkdir dist && npm run css && npm run js && npm run static
